JobFullDesc: The Business Engineering and Partner Solutions team (BEPS) provides businesses with the solutions they need to face the tasks of today, as well as the expertise to engineer a path to the future. Depending on a business’ needs, BEPS will connect them with in-house engineers, recommend the right partners, or develop a customized combination of both. By integrating technology and partnerships in one team, BEPS can employ the right solution, empowering businesses to grow today and build for tomorrow. No matter where a business is on their journey - whether they’re trying to engage new customers or advertise and sell more effectively. Build new solutions and best practices to help businesses sustain that success. We are looking for Product Partnerships Managers to build and grow Messaging partner ecosystems across Messenger, WhatsApp, and Instagram. Private messaging is one of the fastest growing areas of online communication in general and at Facebook. Our team is cultivating and growing an ecosystem of messaging partners to enable end client success through their solutions. This role will focus on developing and managing end to end messaging programs that drive effectiveness, discovery, and adoption of partners at scale. You will be responsible for collaborating with other teams to think through end-to-end program development, testing, launching, and optimization. You will work closely with cross-functional teams such as product, partner management, business development, business operations, and data science. You will make an impact on a global scale working with teams that are building Facebook’s fast growing messaging products and partner ecosystems. To be successful in the role, you will be a well-rounded 'business athlete’ – an analytical problem solver, someone who understands what it takes to execute on a global level, and a dynamic people leader in complex cross-functional environments. You will also have a strong product sensibility, able to shape a partner program grounded in a solid understanding of Facebook's messaging products, as well as a vision for how partner ecosystems can
